protein.specific_function: Involved in the cell-cell adhesion. Has calcium- and magnesium-independent cell-cell adhesion activity. May have tumor- suppressor activity

reference.reference_text: Fukuhara H, Kuramochi M, Nobukuni T, Fukami T, Saino M, Maruyama T, Nomura S, Sekiya T, Murakami Y: Isolation of the TSLL1 and TSLL2 genes, members of the tumor suppressor TSLC1 gene family encoding transmembrane proteins. Oncogene. 2001 Aug 30;20(38):5401-7.
